description:
Be creative with coloring by number game. Color arts or create your own pixel art. Play color by number without internet for free. Lama coloring book for adult & kid!

Lama Color by number sandbox is free to play, pixel art coloring game.

Color your stress away with our adult coloring book!

Paint your life vividly coloring by number! Discover more than 1500+ FREE 2D artworks to color or create your own pixel art, easy & fun! A myriad of themed coloring pages for your joy, including animals, emojis, fashion, flowers, food, etc!

If you enjoy your puzzle games, drawing games or coloring games, this fun coloring sandbox will not only help you while away some time, but also relax after a hard day. Lama color by number is your perfect stress relief app if you love to paint, color, draw and just have fun.

Llama is a popular character among the art games & baby games, let it help you color pixel in your way into the most fun drawing adventure!

Why play our paint by number game?

✨ With Lama, color by pixel art becomes even more exciting, with more than 1500+ pictures available in the game - and they are updated daily! Choose the one you prefer, color and recolor it any time you want - no paper and paint needed.

🔮 In our adult coloring book, you can choose from a variety of themes: pokemon, unicorn, rainbow, flowers, mandala, artistic, animals and anime. We designed dozens of kawaii-characters to paint even though we are not only aimed at the girl games niche - everyone can find something for themselves. Rediscover the new way of drawing, your pixels like Minecraft in the free games category😉

📸 Haven’t found the painting you like in the coloring book? Simply create your own happy color pixel art, by shooting and uploading a photo or a selfie with a pixelart builder!

🧘‍♂️ Lama coloring game is one of the sandbox game. It’s a unique relaxation and meditation experience - your own antistres therapy! Choose the most soothing sounds in the background: rain, fire, birds chipping, etc, and make all the worries go away with our color by number for adults app.

👶 Lama is a perfect color game for kids, just as it is a stress-free fun game for adul! It has been proven that drawing apps and creative games - especially color by number ones help develop attentiveness, patience and motor skills. With Lama your kid can learn trendy colors, numbers, shades and use imagination!

🎁 Love bonuses? Challenge yourself and complete tasks to get coloring superpowers! Unlock your artsy achievements every day: use our free pixel art book and enjoy prises for your drawings!

🎨 Choose, draw it and share your tap color achievements and daily challenge results with your friends and family in instagram, tiktok, facebook, snapchat, tumblr, pinterest, wechat, viber! Let them see perfect paint.

How to play?
1. Choose a pixel art you’d like to paint or add your own foto
2. Zoom
3. Tap color to the drawing
4. Watch the pigment appear
5. Relax, feel your stress and tension go away even if you are offline

Lama is a free pixel art game, or Juegos gratis, as our Spanish friends may say, that you will want to play anywhere you go - it perfectly lies in the category of fun no wi-fi games. Just watch, soon you’ll see all the youtube kids coloring together with you! Lama is kid friendly game!

No matter what age you are, even if you’re looking for baby games for girls & boys, Lama is one of those relaxing games that will grant you a unique and exciting drawing and coloring fun experience. Download for free now, and enjoy your color pixel time!
